name: Safari Quest
synopsis: The director of her university, Peter Falk, has sent the young biologist Jane on a quest to Africa. Her job? Track down a rare white lion and study the strange and mysterious animal. Jane is thrilled – out of the lab and into excitement at last! Soon, she finds herself on a plane bound for match 3 adventures in Africa. Joining her are her animal friends Chippy the ape, Leo the lion, Heppo the hippo and Blacky the Zebra. The hunt for the white lion is more difficult than they had ever imagined – but Jane has an ace up her sleeve. She can change the match 3 mode whenever she wants, playfully solving even the most devilish puzzles. Armed with her journal and camera, she is set to record everything that happens. Thanks to her tablet PC, help from her boss is always just a tap away. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime? - 100 challenging levels - Freely selectable match 3 modes - Your friends help you on your quest - Fast-paced match 3 gameplay - Easy to get started – hard to stop!
